Alphah/Konkholor/Nightstrike.

"It... was my fault, wan't it" said ALphah, who still was temnling 
and almots in shock"I should had to shot him and no doubt... it was 
just a dart-gun... I had to shot him and he would sleep... I hadn't 
to doubt.."

Khonkolor still was sleeping and snoring "zzzz. MEeeeeeow... zzzz... 
MEeeeeow...."

***********

Nightstrike reached the exit, by a second he looked the sunny blue 
sky. Suddenly a flash back of his lost memories started, he felt 
something strange: fear... he needed escape... he needed come back at 
his home... he needed stay with Maximals... He couldn't explain 
that... He couldn't explain what was happening to him

WHile he was suffering his flashback, he put his hands on his head, 
as if he were suffering a huge headache and started breath.

His Decepticon's program could took the control again and the flash 
back end. Now he was once Nightstrike, the decepticon. He took 
breath... In few seconds he would leave Maximal city
 
--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Epyon::
> 
> "Well Siref, that Decepticon, was one of my Maximals, Condor,
> reprogramed. We were trying to bring him back, but I guess that 
plan is
> scrap now."
